shadow.name: DESIRE
shadow.description: Craving for intensity, addiction to emotional experience
shadow.behavioral_signature: Chasing highs, creating drama for stimulation
shadow.thought_pattern: I need something more. This isn't enough.

gift.name: LIGHTNESS
gift.description: Recognition of desire without being enslaved by it
gift.somatic_signature: Allowing emotional fire without being consumed
gift.thought_pattern: I feel the desire. I am not the desire.

siddhi.name: RAPTURE
siddhi.description: Pure ecstatic presence, desire fulfilled in being itself
siddhi.behavioral_signature: Burning with divine passion, nothing to attain
siddhi.thought_pattern: Everything is already complete. I am the fire itself.

inversion_protocols.script: You are addicted to emotional intensity because you believe stillness is death. Gate 30 is emotional fuelâ€”it craves experience. But when you chase intensity, you create suffering. True lightness comes from witnessing desire without acting on every impulse. You are already alive. You don't need drama to prove it.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel the craving in your solar plexus. Don't feed it. Just feel it. Notice you're still alive without satisfying it.

experiment.hypothesis: If I witness desires without immediately satisfying them for 7 days, the craving will decrease.
experiment.action: When desire arises, pause. Feel it. Don't act on it immediately. Wait 24 hours. Many desires will pass.

success_criteria.target: Decreased urgency around desires, more peace
